answers.answer: 35+2 as well and omg I feel you!!!! The pregnancy os finally getting to me.. I feel like crap... I camt wait to have this little one in my arms. Lol

34+3 and just diagnosed with gestational diabetes. Ontop if being uncomfortable and in pain all the time I have to check my blood sugar 7 times a day and inject insulin 3 times. So much work now instead of just trying to relax!
ohh gosh that must be horrible =( .. hope u and ur lil one are ok !yeah definetly cant wait til this is over ...

question: immmm so unconfy , i cant sleep at nigh , i have a horrible nausia today and the world is spinning before my eyes , the heartburn are getting worse and my legs cramp all nigh long !! one more month of this :-\ .. how u ladies doing ??
title: 35+2 and i feel like poop !!
